overview: Follow the perilous journey of Bernie the cub bear as he returns to life in the wild with two other captive sun bear cubs. Witness their immersion back into the rainforest of Indonesia, as they playfully engage in this new natural habitat full of surprises and beauty.  This story is told and captured on camera by the foster parent of these cubs who accompanied them to their independence. A tribute to life on earth, a reminder that we are all connected and that we owe respect and compassion to those we share the planet with. And the most intimate portrait of the cuddly and sharp-nailed sun bear!
title: Life Is One
